title: Retail Trainer
content:
OVERVIEW:
At Gymshark, our mission is to Unite the Conditioning Community. We do this by bringing together the Gymshark family ‚Äì whether it be through a love of conditioning, wearing our product, following our Athletes or viewing content across our various social platforms. 
In October 2022, the 10th year of our existence, we opened our very first Retail Store - a Flagship on London‚Äôs prestigious Regent St.  A permanent space in which our community can meet, shop, and work out.  Our store is an experience totally unique to Gymshark, and not your typical retail environment. It‚Äôs all about experience first, and retail second.  A creative and flexible space, where everyone can feel at home, meet friends, make new ones, or just hang out.  A place where URL meets IRL. 
We're expanding our retail training team. As our Retail Trainer you'll deliver our in store training; ensuring we show up consistently in our teams & community experience across the globe & to be our cultural ‚Äúnorth star‚Äù.You're responsible for creating the training programme from onboarding through to development with end-to-end accountability for the delivery and subsequent updates / refreshes in line with our culture & values. You‚Äôre also responsible for being a retail ‚Äúconsultant‚Äù to the business and supporting Gymshark to deliver the highest value for every initiative to support our global roll out of retail stores. 
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

Designing, creating, delivering & evaluating the success of Gymsharks training & career development programme & supporting materials for our store team
Support the overall integrity & stability of the store training & career development programme
Championing DEI and ensuring content is accessible & appropriate for all
Partnering with training leads in stores
Using data & feedback to monitor effectiveness & measures outcomes [impact, ROI] of our training & career development programmes & workshops to continuously improve and ensure the needs to our teams and business are met
Facilitating engaging, inspiring & fun workshops both in real life & online
Supporting & delivering ‚Äúon the ground‚Äù training for our stores
Being a coach and mentor to the team
Playing an active role in consulting around in real life programmes and work streams; sharing knowledge & best practise to reduce inefficiency, & eliminating points of frustration
Proactively network outside Gymshark & continually scan the landscape for best practises & innovation
Keeping self & the team up to date on new legislation & new ways of working
Encouraging a culture of belonging that everyone wants to be part of

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:

Experience as a retail trainer within a fast paced, high volume & agile environment
Experience in high culture environments
People first mindset
Experience in building retail training & career development programmes
Understanding of a variety of learning techniques
Experienced Coach & Mentor
Effective facilitator, storyteller and highly effective communicator both in writing & speech
Experience with Learning Management System and building online resource portals
Interacting & influencing on multiple levels
Comfortable with giving and receiving constructive feedback & willing to challenge and be challenged

WHO YOU ARE:

You lead by example with a diverse, accessible and inclusive approach
You adjust your approach to assist and elevate others
You inspire trust, and trust those around you
Always questioning the norm, strive for innovation, originality, and improvement
Win and lose together mentality 

This is a hybrid role and would require the successful candidate to attend at least 3-4 days a week in our London office.
Closing date: 10th November 2023
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email retailtalent@gymshark.com. 
OUR VALUES ARE INVALUABLE
Sharing the same values makes us who we are ‚Äì visionaries. You will be the type of person that always looks to be accessible, inclusive, and humble (Be Human). You are conscious of the world we live in, caring for those around us and are proactive to create positive change (Give a Shit). You are honest, trustworthy, and genuine (Do the Right Thing). You are ambitious, agile and have a disruptive approach (Find the Gymshark Way). You understand that to go further, we go together (Put Family First). 
THE PERKS.
At Gymshark we believe in the importance of investing in our employees through their physical, mental, and financial health along with being able to provide some fun and inclusive perks along the way.
